Overview:
Buildkite BuildWatch is a powerful Chrome plugin designed to streamline your development workflow by providing real-time access and control over your Buildkite builds directly from your browser. With a user-friendly interface and essential features, this plugin empowers developers to effortlessly monitor, manage, and stay informed about their builds without switching between multiple tools or windows.

Key Features:

Real-time Build Monitoring: Stay in the know about the status of your Buildkite builds with real-time updates right in your Chrome browser. No more constantly switching tabs or applications to check on your builds.

Stop/Restart Builds: Take control of your builds by stopping or restarting them directly from the plugin interface. This feature ensures that you can quickly address issues or make necessary adjustments to your CI/CD pipelines without leaving your development environment.

Build Notifications: Never miss a critical build event again. Buildkite BuildWatch provides customizable notifications, keeping you informed about build status changes, successes, failures, and more. Stay focused on your work, and let the plugin keep you in the loop.

Seamless Build Linking: Easily access the details of specific builds and get to them quickliy.

Benefits:

Efficiency: Boost your productivity by managing your Buildkite builds without disrupting your workflow. Quickly take action on builds, whether it's pausing a problematic one or resuming a critical job.

Reduced Context Switching: Eliminate the need to switch between tabs, applications, or devices to check on your builds. Keep your development environment clutter-free and stay focused on coding.

Enhanced Visibility: Stay informed and make informed decisions with timely notifications and easy access to build details. This increased visibility into your CI/CD pipeline helps you proactively address issues and maintain a smooth development process.

Customizable Experience: Tailor the plugin to suit your preferences. Customize notifications, organize your builds, and link directly to the information you need for your specific projects.

Get Started:
Streamline your development workflow and improve your productivity with the Buildkite BuildWatch Chrome Plugin. Download it today from the Chrome Web Store and experience the convenience of managing your Buildkite builds right from your browser.

Make Buildkite BuildWatch your go-to tool for efficient, hassle-free build management, and never miss a beat in your CI/CD pipeline again.
